property.name: ozone.enabled
property.description: Status of the Ozone Object Storage service is enabled. Set to true to enable Ozone. Set to false to disable Ozone.

property.name: ozone.handler.type
property.description: The second key dfs.storage.handler.type tells ozone which storage handler to use. The possible values are: distributed - The Ozone distributed storage handler. local - Local Storage handler strictly for testing.

property.name: ozone.container.metadata.dirs
property.description: Ozone metadata dir path.

property.name: ozone.administrators
property.description: Ozone administrator users delimited by comma. If not set, only the user who launches an ozone service will be the admin user. This property must be set if ozone services are started by different users. Otherwise the RPC layer will reject calls from other servers which are started by users not in the list.

property.name: ozone.client.socket.timeout.ms
property.description: Socket timeout for Ozone client in milliseconds.

property.name: ozone.client.connection.timeout.ms
property.description: Connection timeout for Ozone client in milliseconds.

property.name: ozone.scm.client.address
property.description:
The address of the Ozone SCM client service. This is a required setting.
It is a string in the host:port format. The port number is optional and defaults to 9860.

property.name: ozone.scm.client.port
property.description: The port number of the Ozone SCM client service.

property.name: ozone.scm.datanode.address
property.description:
The address of the Ozone SCM service used for internal communication between the DataNodes and the SCM.
It is a string in the host:port format. The port number is optional and defaults to 9861.
This setting is optional. If unspecified then the hostname portion is picked from the ozone.scm.client.address setting and the default service port of 9861 is chosen.

property.name: ozone.scm.datanode.bind.host
property.description: The hostname or IP address used by the SCM service endpoint to bind.

property.name: ozone.scm.datanode.port
property.description: The port number of the Ozone SCM service.

property.name: ozone.scm.client.bind.host
property.description:
The hostname or IP address used by the SCM client endpoint to bind. This setting is used by the SCM only and never used by clients.
The setting can be useful in multi-homed setups to restrict the availability of the SCM client service to a specific interface.
The default is appropriate for most clusters.

property.name: ozone.scm.internal.bind.host
property.description:
The hostname or IP address used by the SCM DataNode handler service to bind. This setting is used by the SCM only and never used by clients or Data Nodes.
The setting can be useful in multi-homed setups to restrict the availability of the SCM to a specific interface.
The default is appropriate for most clusters.

property.name: ozone.scm.block.client.address
property.description: The address of the Ozone SCM block client service.

property.name: ozone.scm.block.client.bind.host
property.description: The hostname or IP address used by the SCM block client endpoint to bind.

property.name: ozone.scm.block.client.port
property.description: The port number of the Ozone SCM block client service.

property.name: ozone.scm.handler.count.key
property.description:
The number of RPC handler threads for each SCM service endpoint.
The default is appropriate for small clusters (tens of nodes).

property.name: ozone.scm.chunk.size
property.description:
The chunk size for read/write chunk operations in bytes.
The chunk size defaults to 1MB. If the value configured is more than the maximum size (1MB), it will be reset to the maximum size.

property.name: ozone.scm.heartbeat.interval.seconds
property.description: The heartbeat interval from a datanode to SCM in seconds.

property.name: ozone.scm.stale.node.interval.ms
property.description: The interval in milliseconds for stale node flagging.

property.name: ozone.scm.dead.node.interval.ms
property.description: The interval in milliseconds for dead node flagging.

property.name: ozone.scm.max.hb.count.to.process
property.description: The maximum number of heartbeat to process per loop of the process thread.

property.name: ozone.scm.heartbeat.thread.interval.ms
property.description: The interval in milliseconds that the heartbeat processor thread runs.

property.name: ozone.scm.heartbeat.rpc-timeout
property.description: Timeout value for the RPC from Datanode to SCM in milliseconds.

property.name: ozone.scm.heartbeat.log.warn.interval.count
property.description: Defines how frequently we will log the missing of heartbeat to SCM. For example in the default case, we will write a warning message for each 10 sequential heartbeats that we miss to SCM.

property.name: ozone.scm.names
property.description: The value of this property is a set of DNS | DNS:PORT | IP Address | IP:PORT. Written as a comma separated string. e.g. scm1, scm2:8020, 7.7.7.7:7777. This property allows datanodes to discover where SCM is, so that datanodes can send heartbeat to SCM.

property.name: ozone.scm.datanode.id
property.description: The path that datanodes will created to store the datanode ID. If this value is not set, datanodes will fail to come up.

property.name: ozone.scm.db.cache.size.mb
property.description: The cache size for SCM level db store in MB.

property.name: ozone.scm.container.size.gb
property.description: Storage container size in GB for block allocations.

property.name: ozone.scm.container.placement.impl
property.description: Placement policy class for containers. Defaults to SCMContainerPlacementRandom.class

property.name: ozone.scm.container.provision_batch_size
property.description: Pre-provision specified number of containers to creare for block creation.

property.name: dfs.container.ipc
property.description: The ipc port number of container.

property.name: dfs.container.ipc.random.port
property.description: Whether allocates a random free port for ozone container.

property.name: dfs.container.ratis.server.id
property.description: The unique ID to identify a Ratis server.

property.name: ozone.ksm.handler.count.key
property.description: The number of RPC handler threads for each KSM service endpoint.

property.name: ozone.ksm.address
property.description: The address of the Ozone KSM service.

property.name: ozone.ksm.leveldb.cache.size.mb
property.description: The size of KSM LevelDB cache in MB that used for caching files.

property.name: ozone.ksm.user.max.volume
property.description: The maximum number of volumes that each user can create.

property.name: ozone.ksm.user.rights
property.description: Default user permissions in Ozone KSM.

property.name: ozone.ksm.group.rights
property.description: Default group permissions in Ozone KSM.

property.name: ozone.scm.http.enabled
property.description: Property to enable or disable SCM web ui.

property.name: ozone.scm.http-address
property.description:
The address and the base port where the SCM web ui will listen on.
If the port is 0 then the server will start on a free port.

property.name: ozone.scm.http-bind-host
property.description: The actual address the SCM web server will bind to. If this optional address is set, it overrides only the hostname portion of ozone.scm.http-address.

property.name: ozone.scm.https-address
property.description:
The address and the base port where the SCM web ui will listen on using HTTPS.
If the port is 0 then the server will start on a free port.

property.name: ozone.scm.https-bind-host
property.description: The actual address the SCM web server will bind to using HTTPS. If this optional address is set, it overrides only the hostname portion of ozone.scm.http-address.

property.name: ozone.ksm.http.enabled
property.description: Property to enable or disable KSM web ui.

property.name: ozone.ksm.http-address
property.description:
The address and the base port where the KSM web ui will listen on.
If the port is 0 then the server will start on a free port.

property.name: ozone.ksm.http-bind-host
property.description: The actual address the KSM web server will bind to. If this optional address is set, it overrides only the hostname portion of ozone.ksm.http-address.

property.name: ozone.ksm.https-address
property.description:
The address and the base port where the KSM web ui will listen on using HTTPS.
If the port is 0 then the server will start on a free port.

property.name: ozone.ksm.https-bind-host
property.description: The actual address the KSM web server will bind to using HTTPS. If this optional address is set, it overrides only the hostname portion of ozone.ksm.http-address.

property.name: ozone.web.authentication.kerberos.principal
property.description:
The server principal used by the SCM and KSM for web UI SPNEGO authentication when Kerberos security is enabled. This is typically set to HTTP/_HOST@REALM.TLD The SPNEGO server principal begins with the prefix HTTP/ by convention.
If the value is '*', the web server will attempt to login with every principal specified in the keytab file.

property.name: ozone.scm.keytab.file
property.description: The keytab file for Kerberos authentication in SCM.

property.name: ozone.ksm.keytab.file
property.description: The keytab file for Kerberos authentication in KSM.
